text:
Been a regular at this clinic for a while. Most of the time, the doctors and staff are professional ‚Äî but once in a while, they really pull out all the stops to make sure you never forget the experience.

Incident 1:
Went in feeling a bit feverish before an overseas trip. Barely finished explaining my symptoms before the doctor, using powers unseen since biblical times, immediately declared loudly (inside the consultation room) that I must have COVID. No tests, no stethoscope, not even a thermometer glance ‚Äî just pure third-eye medical vision.
The nurse had earlier claimed my temperature was ‚Äúsuper high.‚Äù Trusting my instincts (and not the spirit medium in the white coat), I ran to another clinic. Surprise: no fever, no COVID. 10/10 diagnostic skills ‚Äî if the goal was to cause unnecessary stress.

Incident 2:
Fast forward to today ‚Äî went back to ask about wound dressing costs after neck surgery which is foreseen to takes 4-7 weeks to heal. Got quoted over $100 per session (consultation + dressing). Explained nicely that it‚Äôs out of my budget since daily dressing would easily snowball into a $4000‚Äì$5000 bill.
Instead of basic human decency, I got a smirk and a sarcastic ‚ÄúOh, is it?‚Äù followed by intimidation about how even polyclinics would ‚Äúturn me away‚Äù without an appointment. This, after I explained (and showed my hospital memo) that hospital nurses had advised me to visit clinics if polyclinics aren‚Äôt open.

Moral of the story:
‚Ä¢	Diagnoses based on gut feeling? Check.
‚Ä¢	Quoting luxury hotel rates for wound dressing? Check.
‚Ä¢	Condescending staff trained at the Ministry of Mockery? Check.

If you enjoy high prices, wrong medical calls, and being looked down on when you‚Äôre already vulnerable, this place will absolutely exceed your expectations.

Dr Jasmine Lee attended to me at the clinic to review my medical report and chronic medication. She was attentive and explained everything in great details to help me managed my health issues. This is rare professionalism I don't see alot nowadays.

Would rather choose this One Care clinic Senja Cl branch as staff are more decent and knows how to give respect to patient. Doctors are giving excellent service too. Thank you for the great service ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

I went to one care senja today , Such a pleasant visit.. Dr Kasun perera was really very nice n caring. N also very polite. Counter staff also very professional. I'm also from medical line I know sometimes it's exhausted but seeing them with a smile it's very nice. Clinic very clean n well maintained
Good job..
So clean, peaceful and well organised! The staff K and Dr Alise is so friendly and calm, I was a joy visiting the clinic for my HPV vaccinationüòá
